Text: RE Summer Intern Program Cc Great We appreciate Enron North Americas past support and look forward to your participation this year I have copied the members of the HBA Subcommittee so that they will be aware of Enrons plans to participate We will send you the program information as it becomes available Participation by the Citys corporate leaders such as Enron is a key to the success of this program Thanks Richard V Bays Locke Liddell Sapp LLP Chase Tower Travis Houston TX telephone telecopy email Original Message From Nemec Gerald mailtoGerald NRONcom Sent Friday October PM To Subject FW Summer Intern Program Rick Enron North America Corp has participated in this program the last couple of years and intends to do so again I will be coordinating the program for ENA Please forward any information to my attention for the upcoming process I can be reached directly at Thanks Original Message From Gray Barbara N Sent Thursday October AM To Nemec Gerald Subject FW Summer Intern Program Gerald since you handled this last year I am forwarding this to you to determine from Michelle cash head of recruiting to see if we are planning to participateI cannot imagine that we are not thanks bng Original Message From Bays Rick ENRON Sent Wednesday October AM To Bays Rick Subject Summer Intern Program I am a member of the Houston Bar Association Minority Opportunities in the Legal Profession Committee One of the programs we sponsor is a firstyear law student internship program This committee meets with the students at all of the law schools in Houston and asks them to submit their resumes We then provide copies of the resumes to prospective employers for review The employer then selects the students they would like to interview Some employers have the students participate in their permanent hiring programs Others provide this simply as a learning experience for the students The employer determines the length of the internship and the compensation Six weeks is a common period This is a great program which has provided valuable experience to a large number of students for many years If your organization would be interested in participating in this program or if you would like more information please email me or call me I appreciate your consideration of this matter Please feel free to forward this email to the appropriate persons in your organization Richard V Bays Locke Liddell Sapp LLP Chase Tower Travis Houston TX telephone telecopy email This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
